name: AceJump
description:
AceJump allows you to quickly navigate the caret to any position visible in the editor. See a demo of AceJump in action! Simply hit "ctrl+;", type a character, then type the matching character to Ace Jump.

Getting started

Usage Instructions
notes:
• Add AZERTY keyboard layout, #398, thanks to @delphinaubin
  • Add bounded toggle mode to start jump mode before or after the caret, #401, thanks to @colossatr0n
  • Remove only the highlighters added by AceJump when jump session ends, #407, thanks to @huoguangjin
